name: discontinued MYANIMELIST | Profile Repositions
description:
Change the position of the stats and recent updates, while making the profile slightly more compact!
You are likely to have to alter the positions of each section yourself.
WARNING: Not 100% compatible with other stylesheets! (but might as well give it a test anyway if you're interested)    

See my other MAL stylesheets: https://userstyles.org/users/301033
On MAL: http://myanimelist.net/profile/Steve
additional_info: This is far from perfect and you will back to change the code around a bit, but gives you a rough idea on how to do it (using an inefficient method). Check out this stylesheet that moves the favourites into the left panel on your profile! Master thread on MAL profile improvements since the profile update!
